Name: The Stigma that Signifies Vainglory
AttributesDescription:
When Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 80%.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: "Return, people, to ways of old, and cast aside the arrogant boasts of progress. For yesterday's light shall ever outshine today's pale imitation, as today dimly outglows tomorrow's coming darkness. Cling to the known, the tried, the true. Only then may we find shelter from the terrors and confusion of the unknown."
ObtainedShowDescription: When Resonators are in mid-air, their DMG dealt is Amplified by 80%.
